title: Filter
content:
filter Configuration

Customize filtering rules based on the scope slot of the customized filter. Configurable items: Multi specifies whether to select multiple enumeration options. This parameter is valid only when enable:true is selected. enumable Sets the display of enumeration options in the filter panel. inputFilter Sets the display of the input filtered items in the filter panel. defaultFilter Sets the default filter criteria to be displayed in the filter panel. values specifies the static data source under the display enumeration option function (enumable). label Sets the display value attribute field of enumerated data. The default value is label. value Sets the actual value attribute field of the enumerated data. The default value is'value'.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Advanced Filter Settings
content: You can use inputFilter to configure custom components and conditions for the input filter area, and use extends to add a shortcut filter list
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Set Column Filtering Rules
content: Set the column filtering rule through the filter attribute

title: Custom Filter

title: Server Filter
content: Configure remote-filter to enable server-side filtering. The server-side filtering invokes the fetch-data table for query. The filter-change event is triggered after the server-side filtering. The services/getGridMockData service in this example needs to be implemented. The example simulates the data returned by a remote service
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Enter the default filtering options.
content: Set the default input filtering options through the inputFilter.relation attribute. Enter the built-in options for filtering: equals, unequal, greaterThan, lessThan, equalToGreaterThan, equalToLessThan, contains, startwith, endwith; Custom options can also be configured. When configuring custom options, you need to configure the filtering method through the inputFilter.method attribute.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.
